name: Pulumi
help: Pulumi is controlled primarily using the command line interface (CLI). It works in conjunction with the Pulumi service to deploy changes to your cloud apps and infrastructure. It keeps a history of who updated what in your team and when. This CLI has been designed for great inner loop productivity, in addition to continuous integration and delivery scenarios.

tasks.help: Cancel a stacks currently running update, if any.

properties.name: Stack
properties.help: The name of the stack to operate on. Defaults to the current stack.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Skip confirmation prompts, and proceed with cancellation anyway.

tasks.help: Lists all configuration values for a specific stack.

properties.name: Json
properties.help: Emit output as JSON.

properties.name: ShowSecrets
properties.help: Show secret values when listing config instead of displaying blinded values.

tasks.help: Get a single configuration value.

properties.name: Value
properties.help: The configuration value to get.

properties.name: Json
properties.help: Emit output as JSON.

properties.name: Path
properties.help: The key contains a path to a property in a map or list to get.

tasks.help: Update the local configuration based on the most recent deployment of the stack.

properties.name: Force
properties.help: Overwrite configuration file, if it exists, without creating a backup.

tasks.help: Remove configuration value.

properties.name: Value
properties.help: The configuration value to remove.

properties.name: Path
properties.help: The key contains a path to a property in a map or list to remove.

tasks.help: Set configuration value.

properties.name: Value
properties.help: The configuration value to set.

properties.name: Path
properties.help: The key contains a path to a property in a map or list to set.

properties.name: Plaintext
properties.help: Save the value as plaintext (unencrypted).

properties.name: Secret
properties.help: Encrypt the value instead of storing it in plaintext.

tasks.help: Destroy an existing stack and its resources. Warning: this command is generally irreversible and should be used with great care.

properties.name: Debug
properties.help: Print detailed debugging output during resource operations.

properties.name: Diff
properties.help: Display operation as a rich diff showing the overall change.

properties.name: Message
properties.help: Optional message to associate with the destroy operation.

properties.name: Parallel
properties.help: Allow P resource operations to run in parallel at once (1 for no parallelism). Defaults to unbounded. (default 2147483647).

properties.name: Refresh
properties.help: Refresh the state of the stack's resources before this update.

properties.name: ShowConfig
properties.help: Show configuration keys and variables.

properties.name: ShowReplacementSteps
properties.help: Show detailed resource replacement creates and deletes instead of a single step.

properties.name: ShowSames
properties.help: Show resources that don't need to be updated because they haven't changed, alongside those that do.

properties.name: SkipPreview
properties.help: Do not perform a preview before performing the destroy.

properties.name: SuppressOutputs
properties.help: Suppress display of stack outputs (in case they contain sensitive values).

properties.name: Target
properties.help: Specify a single resource URN to destroy. All resources necessary to destroy this target will also be destroyed. Multiple resources can be specified using: --target urn1 --target urn2.

properties.name: TargetDependents
properties.help: Allows destroying of dependent targets discovered but not specified in --target list.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Automatically approve and perform the destroy after previewing it.

tasks.help: Update history for a stack.

properties.name: Json
properties.help: Emit output as JSON.

properties.name: ShowSecrets
properties.help: Show secret values when listing config instead of displaying blinded values.

tasks.help: Log onto the Pulumi stack. For CI/CD scenarios, an env variable of <c>PULUMI_ACCESS_TOKEN</c> should be set.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Specify a URL or a local/cloud path to the Pulumi instance you wish to use. Defaults to app.pulumi.com.

properties.name: CloudUrl
properties.help: A cloud URL to log into. This is the same as specifying a location.

properties.name: Local
properties.help: Use Pulumi in local-only mode.

tasks.help: Log out of the Pulumi service.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Specify a URL or a local/cloud path to the Pulumi instance you wish to logout from. If no URL is provided, you will be logged out of the current backend.

properties.name: CloudUrl
properties.help: A cloud URL to log out of (defaults to current cloud). This is the same as specifying a location.

properties.name: Local
properties.help: Log out of using local mode.

tasks.help: Show aggregated logs for a stack.

properties.name: Follow
properties.help: Follow the log stream in real time (like tail -f).

properties.name: Json
properties.help: Emit output as JSON.

properties.name: Resource
properties.help: Only return logs for the requested resource ('name', 'type::name' or full URN).  Defaults to returning all logs.

properties.name: Since
properties.help: Only return logs newer than a relative duration ('5s', '2m', '3h') or absolute timestamp.  Defaults to returning the last 1 hour of logs. (default 1h).

tasks.help: Install one or more plugins.

properties.name: KindNameVersion
properties.help: Installation may be run either with a specific KIND, NAME, and VERSION, or by omitting these and letting Pulumi compute the set of plugins that may be required by the current project. VERSION cannot be a range: it must be a specific number.

properties.name: Exact
properties.help: Force installation of an exact version match (usually >= is accepted).

properties.name: File
properties.help: Install a plugin from a tarball file, instead of downloading it.

properties.name: Reinstall
properties.help: Reinstall a plugin even if it already exists.

properties.name: Server
properties.help: A URL to download plugins from.

tasks.help: List plugins.

properties.name: Json
properties.help: Emit output as JSON.

properties.name: Project
properties.help: List only the plugins used by the current project.

tasks.help: Remove plugins.

properties.name: KindNameVersion
properties.help: Specify KIND, NAME, and/or VERSION to narrow down what will be removed. If none are specified, the entire cache will be cleared. If only KIND and NAME are specified, but not VERSION, all versions of the plugin with the given KIND and NAME will be removed. VERSION may be a range.

properties.name: All
properties.help: Remove all plugins.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Skip confirmation prompts, and proceed with removal anyway.

tasks.help: Show a preview of updates to a stack's resources.

properties.name: Config
properties.help: Config to use during the preview.

properties.name: ConfigPath
properties.help: Config keys contain a path to a property in a map or list to set.

properties.name: Debug
properties.help: Print detailed debugging output during resource operations.

properties.name: Diff
properties.help: Display operation as a rich diff showing the overall change.

properties.name: ExpectNoChanges
properties.help: Return an error if any changes are proposed by this preview.

properties.name: Json
properties.help: Serialize the preview diffs, operations, and overall output as JSON.

properties.name: Message
properties.help: Optional message to associate with the preview operation.

properties.name: Parallel
properties.help: Allow P resource operations to run in parallel at once (1 for no parallelism). Defaults to unbounded. (default 2147483647).

properties.name: Refresh
properties.help: Refresh the state of the stack's resources before this update.

properties.name: Replace
properties.help: Refresh the state of the stack's resources before this update.

properties.name: ShowConfig
properties.help: Show configuration keys and variables.

properties.name: ShowReplacementSteps
properties.help: Show detailed resource replacement creates and deletes instead of a single step.

properties.name: ShowSames
properties.help: Show resources that don't need to be updated because they haven't changed, alongside those that do.

properties.name: SuppressOutputs
properties.help: Suppress display of stack outputs (in case they contain sensitive values).

properties.name: Target
properties.help: Specify a single resource URN to update. Other resources will not be updated. Multiple resources can be specified using --target urn1 --target urn2.

properties.name: TargetDependents
properties.help: Allows updating of dependent targets discovered but not specified in --target list.

properties.name: TargetReplace
properties.help: Specify a single resource URN to replace. Other resources will not be updated. Shorthand for --target urn --replace urn.

tasks.help: Refresh the resources in a stack.

properties.name: Debug
properties.help: Print detailed debugging output during resource operations.

properties.name: Diff
properties.help: Display operation as a rich diff showing the overall change.

properties.name: ExpectNoChanges
properties.help: Return an error if any changes occur during this update.

properties.name: Message
properties.help: Optional message to associate with the update operation.

properties.name: Parallel
properties.help: Allow P resource operations to run in parallel at once (1 for no parallelism). Defaults to unbounded. (default 2147483647).

properties.name: ShowReplacementSteps
properties.help: Show detailed resource replacement creates and deletes instead of a single step.

properties.name: ShowSames
properties.help: Show resources that don't need to be updated because they haven't changed, alongside those that do.

properties.name: SuppressOutputs
properties.help: Suppress display of stack outputs (in case they contain sensitive values).

properties.name: Target
properties.help: Specify a single resource URN to refresh. Multiple resources can be specified using --target urn1 --target urn2.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Automatically approve and perform the refresh after previewing it.

tasks.help: Manage stacks.
Export a stack's deployment to standard out.

properties.name: File
properties.help: A filename to write stack output to.

tasks.help: Export a stack's dependency graph to a file.

properties.name: File
properties.help: The file to export to.

properties.name: DependencyEdgeColor
properties.help: Sets the color of dependency edges in the graph (default <c>#246C60</c>).

properties.name: IgnoreDependencyEdges
properties.help: Ignores edges introduced by dependency resource relationships.

properties.name: IgnoreParentEdges
properties.help: Ignores edges introduced by parent/child resource relationships.

properties.name: ParentEdgeColor
properties.help: Sets the color of dependency edges in the graph (default <c>#AA6639</c>).

tasks.help: Import a deployment from standard in into an existing stack.

properties.name: File
properties.help: A filename to read stack input from.

properties.name: Force
properties.help: Force the import to occur, even if apparent errors are discovered beforehand (not recommended).

tasks.help: Create an empty stack with the given name, ready for updates.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the stack to create. Include org name if required.

properties.name: SecretsProvider
properties.help: The type of the provider that should be used to encrypt and decrypt secrets (possible choices: default, passphrase, awskms, azurekeyvault, gcpkms, hashivault) (default: default).

tasks.help: List stacks.

properties.name: All
properties.help: List all stacks instead of just stacks for the current project.

properties.name: Json
properties.help: Emit output as JSON.

properties.name: Organization
properties.help: Filter returned stacks to those in a specific organization.

properties.name: Project
properties.help: Filter returned stacks to those with a specific project name.

properties.name: Tag
properties.help: Filter returned stacks to those in a specific tag (tag-name or tag-name=tag-value).

tasks.help: Show a stacks output properties.

properties.name: PropertyName
properties.help: Show output of a specific property.

properties.name: Json
properties.help: Emit output as JSON.

tasks.help: Rename an existing stack.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the new stack.

tasks.help: Remove a stack and its configuration.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the stack to remove.

properties.name: Force
properties.help: Forces deletion of the stack, leaving behind any resources managed by the stack.

properties.name: PreserveConfig
properties.help: Do not delete the corresponding Pulumi.<stack-name>.yaml configuration file for the stack.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Skip confirmation prompts, and proceed with removal anyway.

tasks.help: Switch the current workspace to the given stack.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the new stack.

tasks.help: Get a single stack tag value.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the tag.

tasks.help: List all stack tags.

properties.name: Json
properties.help: Emit output as JSON.

tasks.help: Remove a stack tag.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the tag.

tasks.help: Set a stack tag.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.help: The value of the tag.

tasks.help: Delete a resource from a stack's state.

properties.name: ResourceURN
properties.help: The resource as specified by its Pulumi URN (use <c>pulumi stack �show-urns</c> to get it).

properties.name: Force
properties.help: Force deletion of protected resources.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Skip confirmation prompts.

tasks.help: Unprotect resources in a stack's state.

properties.name: ResourceURN
properties.help: The resource as specified by its Pulumi URN (use <c>pulumi stack �show-urns</c> to get it).

properties.name: All
properties.help: Unprotect all resources in the checkpoint.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Skip confirmation prompts.

tasks.help: Create or update the resources in a stack.

properties.name: Config
properties.help: Config to use during the update.

properties.name: ConfigPath
properties.help: Config keys contain a path to a property in a map or list to set.

properties.name: Debug
properties.help: Print detailed debugging output during resource operations.

properties.name: Diff
properties.help: Display operation as a rich diff showing the overall change.

properties.name: ExpectNoChanges
properties.help: Return an error if any changes are proposed by this update.

properties.name: Message
properties.help: Optional message to associate with the update operation.

properties.name: Parallel
properties.help: Allow P resource operations to run in parallel at once (1 for no parallelism). Defaults to unbounded. (default 2147483647).

properties.name: Refresh
properties.help: Refresh the state of the stack's resources before this update.

properties.name: Replace
properties.help: Refresh the state of the stack's resources before this update.

properties.name: SecretsProvider
properties.help: The type of the provider that should be used to encrypt and decrypt secrets (possible choices: default, passphrase, awskms, azurekeyvault, gcpkms, hashivault). Only used when creating a new stack from an existing template (default: default).

properties.name: ShowConfig
properties.help: Show configuration keys and variables.

properties.name: ShowReads
properties.help: Show resources that are being read in, alongside those being managed directly in the stack.

properties.name: ShowReplacementSteps
properties.help: Show detailed resource replacement creates and deletes instead of a single step.

properties.name: ShowSames
properties.help: Show resources that don't need to be updated because they haven't changed, alongside those that do.

properties.name: SkipPreview
properties.help: Do not perform a preview before performing the update.

properties.name: SuppressOutputs
properties.help: Suppress display of stack outputs (in case they contain sensitive values).

properties.name: Target
properties.help: Specify a single resource URN to update. Other resources will not be updated. Multiple resources can be specified using --target urn1 --target urn2.

properties.name: TargetDependents
properties.help: Allows updating of dependent targets discovered but not specified in --target list.

properties.name: TargetReplace
properties.help: Specify a single resource URN to replace. Other resources will not be updated. Shorthand for --target urn --replace urn.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Automatically approve and perform the update after previewing it.

commonTaskProperties.name: Color
commonTaskProperties.help: Colorize output. Choices are: always, never, raw, auto (default is auto)

commonTaskProperties.name: WorkingDirectory
commonTaskProperties.help: Run pulumi as if it had been started in another directory

commonTaskProperties.name: DisableIntegrityChecking
commonTaskProperties.help: Disable integrity checking of checkpoint files

commonTaskProperties.name: Emoji
commonTaskProperties.help: Enable emojis in the output (default is true)

commonTaskProperties.name: LogFlow
commonTaskProperties.help: Flow log settings to child processes (like plugins)

commonTaskProperties.name: LogToStderr
commonTaskProperties.help: Log to stderr instead of to files

commonTaskProperties.name: NonInteractive
commonTaskProperties.help: Disable interactive mode for all commands

commonTaskProperties.name: Profiling
commonTaskProperties.help: Emit CPU and memory profiles and an execution trace to '[filename].[pid].{cpu,mem,trace}', respectively

commonTaskProperties.name: Tracing
commonTaskProperties.help: Emit tracing to the specified endpoint. Use the file: scheme to write tracing data to a local file

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Enable verbose logging (e.g., v=3); anything >3 is very verbose

stackSelect.name: Stack
stackSelect.help: The name of the stack to operate on. Defaults to the current stack

configFile.name: ConfigFile
configFile.help: Use the configuration values in the specified file rather than detecting the file name

stackInherit.name: ShowIds
stackInherit.help: Display each resource's provider-assigned unique ID

stackInherit.name: ShowSecrets
stackInherit.help: Display stack outputs which are marked as secret in plaintext

stackInherit.name: ShowUrns
stackInherit.help: Display each resource's Pulumi-assigned globally unique URN
